qas.question: When does The Bingley Arms claim to have been founded?
In what county is the Bingley Arms located?
When does the building housing Ye Olde Salutation Inn date back to?
Where is Ye Olde Salutation Inn located?
When does the building housing Ye Olde Man & Scythe date from?

context: The Bingley Arms, Bardsey, <a1_0>Yorkshire<a1_0/>, is claimed to date to <a0_0>905<a0_0/> AD. Ye Olde Salutation Inn in <a3_0>Nottingham<a3_0/> dates from <a2_0>1240<a2_0/>, although the building served as a tannery and a private residence before becoming an inn sometime before the English Civil War. The Adam and Eve in Norwich was first recorded in 1249, when it was an alehouse for the workers constructing nearby Norwich Cathedral. Ye Olde Man & Scythe in Bolton, Lancashire, is mentioned by name in a charter of 1251, but the current building is dated <a4_0>1631<a4_0/>. Its cellars are the only surviving part of the older structure.
